name: Merlin AI
headline: AI powered ERP for Construction
description:
Merlin is an AI-powered ERP for construction companies. 

We provide construction companies with a single, AI-powered platform to manage their entire business operations. Our platform unifies project management, materials management, finance, estimating, and CRM—traditionally scattered across multiple systems—into one cohesive solution. For the first time, construction firms can automate and oversee every aspect of their projects in a single, intuitive system. Today, construction companies pay for 8-17 different tools - that we eliminate the need for. 

We reduce 

- Manual work by 60%
- Cut software costs by $10,000 monthly
- Complete projects 3x faster. 

Why Now?
We're witnessing a perfect storm of factors: decades of stagnation in traditional ERP systems, a multi-billion-dollar industry built on misaligned incentives, and the transformative potential of AI. This confluence creates a rare cyclical opportunity for market upheaval. The last major shift in this space occurred in the 1990s with the advent of digital systems, and now, 30 years later, we're on the cusp of another seismic change. Customers are crying out for innovation and as AI reshapes the landscape, early customer signals indicate an eagerness for smarter, more efficient systems. It's a unique window of opportunity that opens perhaps once in a multi-decade chance to redefine an entire industry's operational backbone.

Team:
KS, a BITS Pilani grad and successful startup co-founder, and Ayantika, an IIT alumni and tech expert, bring extensive coding and product development expertise together bringing about over a decade of technical expertise. Sneha ( that’s me), with over a decade of experience in supply chain management and lean manufacturing within the construction industry, has lived the pain of using ERPs in this industry.

## FAQs
What is Merlin AI
Merlin AI is an all-in-one construction management platform powered by advanced artificial intelligence. Our innovative software solutions streamline your project planning, financial management, operations, inventory control, and sales enablement - helping you work smarter, faster, and more profitably.
How does Merlin AI use AI to improve construction management?
Through a cross-platform intelligence collaboration, Merlin AI swiftly gathers data and translates it into advanced visualizations. This empowers real-time project insights, facilitating informed decision-making and immediate action. By enhancing awareness and analysis capabilities, Merlin AI significantly boosts profitability and productivity. Leveraging cutting-edge technology, it enables you to stay ahead of the curve and maximize efficiency.
What construction industries does Merlin AI serve?
In the construction industry, numerous opportunities abound for enhancing projects, ranging from single-family homes to multifamily complexes and commercial developments. Among our key areas of focus is Modern Methods of Construction, encompassing modular, volumetric, manufactured, panelized, and high-performance techniques.
How much does Merlin AI cost?
Our comprehensive platform encompasses accounts receivable, accounts payable, operations, purchasing, procurement, factory operations, and workflow management. We aim to tailor a program specifically to meet your company's unique requirements—no one-size-fits-all approach here. Each vertical comes with specific pricing options, including our most sought-after services. Our priority is to identify what's currently effective and provide targeted solutions for areas that require improvement. That said, our product ends up costing a fraction of the cost of typical Enterprise Resource Planning in this space.
What kind of support does Merlin AI provide?
We specialize in rapid one-week installations for our services. Through swift data implementation, we seamlessly integrate existing platform solutions into our system. Our installation process not only sets up assistance at your facility but also includes comprehensive training and review of all applications and solutions by our expert team. Our objective is to simplify the process and utilize AI responses to automate the rest, ensuring a smooth transition and maximum efficiency.
